long_description: A quality bike you won't quickly outgrow, the Cannondale Trail 5 women's bike introduces you to the world of mountain biking with a shock-absorbent front fork and entry-level Shimano components. 6061 aluminum frame features strength-optimizing, butted tubes and shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve efficiency and comfort. SR Suntour XCM suspension fork delivers 100mm of travel with hydraulic lockout; suspension springs are optimized for women. Shimano shifters and rear derailleur perform smoothly as you shift through the 27-speed drivetrain, which is powered by Shimano cranks. Cannondale mechanical disc brakes use 160mm rotors to provide powerful braking. Stout, double-walled Alex rims are outfitted with Kenda Small Block 8 tires to provide grippy, fast-rolling performance. Specs on the Cannondale Trail 5 women's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: A quality bike you won't quickly outgrow, the Cannondale Trail 5 women's bike introduces you to the world of mountain biking with a shock-absorbent front fork and entry-level Shimano components.
